thread.title: High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion

title: High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion
text:
High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion Wednesday, April 18, 2018 - 01:52 
As the Southwest pilot in Tuesday's deadly jet explosion is hailed as hero, investigators Wednesday focused on what caused the engine to explode mid-air and airlines around the world rushed to inspect the safety of their fleets. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
